casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Cleveland Browns, Inc., n.k.a. Baltimore Ravens, Inc., Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Cleveland, Browns, Inc. v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 220.]

(No. 97-1145 Submitted October 27, 1998 Decided December 30, 1998.) Duvin, Cahn & Hutton, Lee J. Hutton and Martin S. List; Dinn, Hochman & Potter, P.L.L., and Irwin J. Dinn, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Michael A. Vanderhorst, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission. Comrich, Katz & Comrich Co., L.P.A., Neil M. Comrich and Robert S. Gurwin, for appellee Mark A. Harper.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
